Reviews.Title: Good beginner digital camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Raymer
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up when opened...  using printed owners manual..  More detailed owners manual on cd disc.  Good auto features for taking pictures but easy to override for specific shooting speeds and lighting situations.  LCD screen bright and automatic to light conditions.  Only things the focus could be a little sharper when taking pictures with the auto feature.  Pictures are sharper when setting camera to shoot at a higher, single ASA speed.  3x optical zoom is good and has easy controls on back of camera... good photo  editing of pictures right on camera and body of camera is solid and feels good to hold and take pictures. Good, little GE digital camera.

Reviews.Title: simple
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: Camera is easy to use. Perfect for those know aren't interested in a fancy hi-tec camera. Good picture quality. Small led display.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Taps
Reviews.Content: The camera is great for what it is. It takes great photos once you transferre them to te computer. It's rugged so you can just throw it in your bag and go and all for under 50 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Terrible indoor results
Reviews.Author: Atenant
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a friend who has never owned a camera.  The price at Frys was only $35.  There is a reason for the low price, GE has another model out that is 14mp.  Regardless of the Megapixel, this camera is basically a toy.  There are no adjustments for ISO and the results for indoor is poor.  Outdoor pictures are just okay, and the movie mode works, but not sharp. I cannot recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Battery compartment broke in 2 months
Reviews.Author: Flanders
Reviews.Content: The camera seemed to be fair quality for a month. In month 2 (after the window for returns expired) the door to the battery compartment would not stay closed. Can't really use it with this defect. Disappointed and I wouldn't recommend.

Reviews.Title: a lot of camera for the money
Reviews.Author: S. S. "a reader"
Reviews.Content: Another 3rd party seller sent me this camera instead of the model I ordered.  It was close enough in features and price that I accepted it as is.  This feature rich camera is the equivalent of much more expensive models by other manufacturers.  The auto flash feature is dependable. Pictures can be blurry, but an unsteady hand is a detriment with much more expensive fare as well.I rate it 4 stars because I have not yet tried shooting indoors enough to be confident of good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: would recomend to all
Reviews.Author: Alex  Malaspino
Reviews.Content: camera is good value for the price.  It was a gift for a family member who is enjoying his new camera greatly.  A little confusing inn the begining, but over all would recomend.

Reviews.Title: VERY slow to take a photo!
Reviews.Author: ohhappydagger@geocities.com
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on customer reviews and it was AWFUl.  I just took it back- maybe GE has downgraded it for 2012.  It takes (I timed it) FOUR TO 6 SECONDS TO TAKE A PICTURE.  First it takes about 3 seconds to get the (already ready) flash set to go, then it takes another 3 to focus.  And the image stabilization is almost worthless.  If you have kids or pets there is no way you can wait 4 seconds to capture a moment.  Plus the surrounding area, when using the flash, appears very dark. PLEASE don't buy this camera even if it's on sale!

Reviews.Title: GE C1233 digital camera
Reviews.Author: GTR
Reviews.Content: This camera is similar to the GE camera that I had before. I like the camera and would buy it again. It is easy to operate and and the cards and batteries from my other camera work so I didn't have to buy more.

Reviews.Title: BUENA CAMARA
Reviews.Author: Richard Barboza
Reviews.Content: FELICITACIONES AL VENDEDOR BUEN CAMARA Y ECONÓMICO, REALMENTE LO QUE ESTABA ESPERANDO, RÁPIDO, SEGURO, EFICIENTE Y EFICAZ LO RECOMIENDO AMPLIAMENTE

Reviews.Title: This product has worked well for me without problems
Reviews.Author: darwinbf
Reviews.Content: This product has worked well for me without problems,This product has worked well for me without problemsThis product has worked well for me without problems
